scripts.transform: npm run shim:transform && npm run test:transform
scripts.shim:transform: cp node_modules/ecmascript_simd/src/ecmascript_simd.js simd.js && replace '.*module\.exports.*' '' simd.js && replace '\(function\(global\) {' 'module.exports = function (global) {' simd.js && replace '}\)\(typeof window !== "undefined" \? window : this\);' '};' simd.js
scripts.test:transform:
npm run test:wrap && replace '(test\([^,]+, ?function ?\()' '$1t_' test/simd.js && replace '(throws\()' "t_['throws'](" test/simd.js && replace '(\s+)(equal|notEqual|ok)\(' '$1t_.$2(' test/simd.js && replace '(isNaN|almostEqual|isPositiveZero|isNegativeZero)\(' '$1(t_, ' test/simd.js && replace '(^}\);)' ' t_.end();
$1' test/simd.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:export && npm run test:shim
scripts.lint: npm run jscs && npm run eslint
scripts.jscs: jscs index.js getGlobal.js test/index.js test/preserve.js test/shim.js test/test-shim.js
scripts.eslint: eslint index.js getGlobal.js test/index.js test/preserve.js test/shim.js test/test-shim.js
